Title: Detective Conan: The Internet - The Mysterious E-mail Case
Description: ['An educational ', Meitantei Conan, " OVA where the Shounen Tantei-dan (Detective Boys/The Junior Detective League) have to do a school research project in the library when they receive a mysterious email that leads them on an educational scavenger hunt. This OVA was released as a bundle with Shogakukan's ", Nijuuisseiki Kodomo Hyakka Kagaku-kan Dai 2-ban (WOW!), " (21st Century Children's Encyclopedia Science Museum 2nd Edition (WOW!)). It uses animated characters on top of live-action backgrounds."]
